body: Lot of die-hard fans below. I on the other hand find this unfappable. The stories suck. The graphics contain almost nothing but stills meaning the artist isn't good enough to convey motion. You can tell what the artist's favorite position to draw is. 80% of the manga is some variation of the frontal-view reverse-cowgirl. If all you need is some stills of some big-titted chick in a reverse-cowgirl position to get you off, then look no further. If you require some substance to the drawings and story, move along.
The High Leg King should be continued. It would be nice to not end on cliff hanger.
Damn, this is so awesome, he/she even give details about their three sizes XD
Another great on from the Jeanne DA'ck.
